summary: Gurthias puts the \"High\" in High Elf to a new extreme.
descriptionHtml:
Gurthias was sent from the SummerSet Isle by the Thalmor to try and create ties with the Giants of Skyrim as even the simple passer-by of any Giant can tell that they are somekind of long-lost race of Mer.

Giants have Elven like ears and to me, are some sort of primitive Elf race that got big somehow.

This mod adds a retextured Giant with the appearance of an Altmer, basically all I did is make a Giant yellow and try to pass him off as a overgrown Altmer male in skimpy armor xD

Gurthias is skilled in one hand and two handed weapons and has a decent amount of HP but is not invincible and when not in combat is ridiculously slow and speeding him up a may work so i will look into that.

Can be found outside the Thalmor Embassy near Solitude.
has the default vanilla Follower package.
He IS useful for carrying a ton of equipment as his encumbrance/weight limit is 9999+

Giant Dunmer next
author: beth
